# Design Manager

> React design token management tool with floating panel UI, OKLCH colors, 7 design tools, and 5 export formats. Self-contained package for any React 18+ application.

## Documentation

- [README](README.md): Installation, usage, props, theme structure, keyboard shortcuts
- [API Reference](docs/API_REFERENCE.md): Components, hooks, types, utility functions
- [Architecture](docs/ARCHITECTURE.md): Package boundaries, folder structure, state shape
- [Color System](docs/COLOR_SYSTEM.md): OKLCH format, contrast checking, CVD simulation
- [Code Map](docs/EXISTING_CODE_MAP.md): File extraction and adaptation guide

## Source Code

### Entry Points
- [index.js](index.js): Public exports for all components, hooks, and utilities
- [DesignManager.jsx](DesignManager.jsx): Main floating panel component
- [package.json](package.json): Dependencies and build configuration

### Context & State
- [DesignManagerContext.jsx](context/DesignManagerContext.jsx): Theme state provider with undo/redo

### Hooks
- [useDesignManager.js](hooks/useDesignManager.js): Public API hook for theme access
- [usePanelState.js](hooks/usePanelState.js): Panel position, size, and persistence
- [useColorExtraction.js](hooks/useColorExtraction.js): Extract colors from images
- [useAIChat.js](hooks/useAIChat.js): AI-powered theme generation chat

### Tabs
- [ToolsTab.jsx](tabs/ToolsTab.jsx): Design tools launcher (7 tools)
- [ColorsTab.jsx](tabs/ColorsTab.jsx): Color token editor
- [TypographyTab.jsx](tabs/TypographyTab.jsx): Font family, weight, scale controls
- [SurfacesTab.jsx](tabs/SurfacesTab.jsx): Paper colors, radius, texture
- [ExportTab.jsx](tabs/ExportTab.jsx): Multi-format export (5 formats)

### Components
- [FloatingPanel.jsx](components/floating-panel/FloatingPanel.jsx): react-rnd wrapper for drag/resize
- [PanelHeader.jsx](components/floating-panel/PanelHeader.jsx): Title bar with controls
- [ColorPicker.jsx](components/controls/ColorPicker.jsx): OKLCH color input with swatch
- [ContrastBadge.jsx](components/controls/ContrastBadge.jsx): WCAG compliance indicator
- [FontSelector.jsx](components/controls/FontSelector.jsx): Font dropdown with preview
- [PhotoExtractor.jsx](components/features/PhotoExtractor.jsx): Image upload and color extraction
- [ColorBlindnessSimulator.jsx](components/features/ColorBlindnessSimulator.jsx): CVD simulation toggle

### Design Tools
- [AIThemeGenerator.jsx](components/tools/AIThemeGenerator.jsx): Chat-based theme generation
- [FontPairing.jsx](components/tools/FontPairing.jsx): AI-recommended font combinations
- [AccessiblePaletteGenerator.jsx](components/tools/AccessiblePaletteGenerator.jsx): WCAG-compliant palette creation
- [ContrastFixer.jsx](components/tools/ContrastFixer.jsx): Fix contrast issues automatically
- [TokenScaleGenerator.jsx](components/tools/TokenScaleGenerator.jsx): Generate token scales
- [LivePreview.jsx](components/tools/LivePreview.jsx): Real-time theme preview
- [DarkModeGenerator.jsx](components/tools/DarkModeGenerator.jsx): Generate dark mode from light

### Library
- [constants.js](lib/constants.js): Default theme, color tokens, token groups, metadata
- [color-utils.js](lib/color-utils.js): OKLCH manipulation using culori
- [contrast-checker.js](lib/contrast-checker.js): WCAG 2.1 contrast calculations
- [color-blindness.js](lib/color-blindness.js): Brettel CVD simulation algorithm
- [theme-utils.js](lib/theme-utils.js): CSS variable application, storage, fonts
- [typography-config.js](lib/typography-config.js): Font catalog with 50+ Google Fonts
- [presets.js](lib/presets.js): Built-in theme presets

### Exporters
- [css-exporter.js](lib/exporters/css-exporter.js): Export as CSS custom properties
- [json-exporter.js](lib/exporters/json-exporter.js): Export as structured JSON
- [tailwind-exporter.js](lib/exporters/tailwind-exporter.js): Export as Tailwind config
- [tokens-exporter.js](lib/exporters/tokens-exporter.js): Export as W3C Design Tokens
- [rules-exporter.js](lib/exporters/rules-exporter.js): Export as style rules

### Styles
- [design-manager.css](styles/design-manager.css): All component styles with dm- prefix

## Color Tokens

16 semantic tokens (shadcn/ui compatible):
- Background: background, foreground
- Cards: card, cardForeground, popover, popoverForeground
- Interactive: primary, primaryForeground, secondary, secondaryForeground
- Accents: accent, accentForeground, muted, mutedForeground
- Forms: border, input, ring, destructive

## Tools

- AI Theme Generator: Natural language theme creation
- Smart Font Pairing: AI-recommended heading/body combinations
- Accessible Palette Generator: WCAG-compliant color palettes
- Contrast Fixer: Automatic contrast issue resolution
- Token Scale Generator: Mathematical token progressions
- Live Preview: Real-time theme visualization
- Dark Mode Generator: Automatic dark mode from light colors
